long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make web reading easier with Easy Font & Zoom! This user-friendly plugin offers an intuitive page zoom and magnifying glass feature to enhance your browsing experience. With the ability to adjust text sizes and zoom in on content, you can easily read all web pages without straining your eyes.

Key Features:

Page Zoom Functionality:
Scale elements and their child elements based on the original size in the document flow.
Offers zoom multipliers of 100%, 200%, 300%, and a customizable slider that allows adjustments from 100% to 400%.
The slider starts at the leftmost position (100%) and can be moved to the right end for maximum zoom (400%).

Reset Button:
Quickly revert back to the original zoom level with the convenient reset option.
Magnifying Glass Tool:

Magnifying glass：
Activate the magnifying glass feature with a simple click on the magnifying glass icon, changing your cursor to a magnifying glass shape for easy zoom functionality.
Provides a default magnification level of 2x, with the ability to increase based on the right-side zoom progressor, going up to 6x.
Adjustable magnifying glass diameter starting at 200px, with a range from 10px to 10,000px to fit your preference.

Experience a more comfortable browsing session with Easy Font & Zoom—your optimal solution for easy web readability!
